translation: Proceed through the underground ruins.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Proceed through the underground ruins.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Brute Trolls!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Brute Trolls!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Golems!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Golems!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: It's Zero! Damn her to hell!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: It's Zero! Damn her to hell!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: She's horrifying! Nothing like our Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: She's horrifying! Nothing like our Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: There she is! All men, take positions!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: There she is! All men, take positions!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: I will gladly sacrifice myself for the sake of Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: I will gladly sacrifice myself for the sake of Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Me to—er, as well!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Me to—er, as well!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: We can't let her get anywhere near Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: We can't let her get anywhere near Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Lady Two must never be befouled!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Lady Two must never be befouled!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Send word a threat approaches! Lady Two is in danger!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Send word a threat approaches! Lady Two is in danger!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Give me 125 percent! You'll need it all against this devil!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Give me 125 percent! You'll need it all against this devil!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Zero is... She's terrifying!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Zero is... She's terrifying!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: I want a world where Lady Two can always be happy!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: I want a world where Lady Two can always be happy!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Stop the demon here and now!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Stop the demon here and now!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: The time is now! Remember your training, men!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: The time is now! Remember your training, men!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Lady Two watches over us! I'm sure of it!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Lady Two watches over us! I'm sure of it!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Open a path! We're carrying wounded here!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Open a path! We're carrying wounded here!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: I'm not dead yet... But I'll take you to hell with me!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: I'm not dead yet... But I'll take you to hell with me!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Our sacrifice here will ensure Lady Two lives on!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Our sacrifice here will ensure Lady Two lives on!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: It's the end of the world... We've all gone mad!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: It's the end of the world... We've all gone mad!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: How can this demon be an Intoner!?{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: How can this demon be an Intoner!?{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: A...a false Intoner!?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: A...a false Intoner!?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Who knows! Just be careful!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Who knows! Just be careful!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: That woman is a disgrace to Lady Two and everything she stands for!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: That woman is a disgrace to Lady Two and everything she stands for!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: We'll be fine so long as Lady Two is with us!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: We'll be fine so long as Lady Two is with us!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Actually, some equipment might help!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Actually, some equipment might help!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Believe in Lady Two, and you will feel no fear!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Believe in Lady Two, and you will feel no fear!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Surely Lady Two hasn't forsaken us, has she?{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Surely Lady Two hasn't forsaken us, has she?{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Don't be ridiculous!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Don't be ridiculous!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Our perfect goddess would never betray us! ...Not like some of the girls I know, anyway!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Our perfect goddess would never betray us! ...Not like some of the girls I know, anyway!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Look out! It's Zero!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Look out! It's Zero!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: To think an Intoner could be so vile!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: To think an Intoner could be so vile!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: No retreat! How would we ever face Lady Two!?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: No retreat! How would we ever face Lady Two!?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Dammit! You're going down!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Dammit! You're going down!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Don't worry about positioning! Just fight!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Don't worry about positioning! Just fight!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: All men, forward! Fight for your very lives!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: All men, forward! Fight for your very lives!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Yaaahhhhh!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Yaaahhhhh!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Dammit! Where the hell is Two!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Dammit! Where the hell is Two!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Easy, Z. It ain't like they're just{LF}gonna hand her over to us.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Easy, Z. It ain't like they're just{LF}gonna hand her over to us.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Then we're just gonna have to take her!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Then we're just gonna have to take her!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady Zero, I'm sensing something from Mikhail.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Lady Zero, I'm sensing something from Mikhail.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Crap. Did he keel over already?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Crap. Did he keel over already?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No, but he is struggling.{LF}I fear he is near his limit.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: No, but he is struggling.{LF}I fear he is near his limit.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Cent!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Cent!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yeees?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Yeees?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I need you to think, okay?{LF}Where's Two? What's her weakness?{#Name="Zero"}
source: I need you to think, okay?{LF}Where's Two? What's her weakness?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You've gotta know something. Come on! Chop chop!{#Name="Zero"}
source: You've gotta know something. Come on! Chop chop!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Give me a moment, will you?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Give me a moment, will you?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Even someone with a massive brain like me{LF}needs time to process things, you know?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Even someone with a massive brain like me{LF}needs time to process things, you know?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: You've got two seconds.{LF}After that, I start kicking balls.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You've got two seconds.{LF}After that, I start kicking balls.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: These foes are quite stubborn, hmm?{LF}We must hurry.{#Name="Octa"}
source: These foes are quite stubborn, hmm?{LF}We must hurry.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I wish I could burn these ruins{LF}and everyone in them.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I wish I could burn these ruins{LF}and everyone in them.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho ho! Always so impulsive...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho ho! Always so impulsive...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Still, I understand. You must be{LF}worried for your dragon.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Still, I understand. You must be{LF}worried for your dragon.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I am no such thing!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I am no such thing!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You gonna be okay, Z?{#Name="Dito"}
source: You gonna be okay, Z?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: What's that supposed to mean?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What's that supposed to mean?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Nothing! It's just...I know how you feel{LF}about these types of situations...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Nothing! It's just...I know how you feel{LF}about these types of situations...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I'm fine.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm fine.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Here we go again...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Here we go again...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: This may not be the wisest course of action...{#Name="Octa"}
source: This may not be the wisest course of action...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Relax. I got this.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Relax. I got this.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Please reconsider, my lady.{LF}None would think lesser of you.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Please reconsider, my lady.{LF}None would think lesser of you.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Enough already!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Enough already!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I said I got this! What kind of an{LF}idiot do you take me for!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: I said I got this! What kind of an{LF}idiot do you take me for!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Watch and learn, chumps!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Watch and learn, chumps!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Don't say a word.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Don't say a word.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, I wasn't gonna.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Oh, I wasn't gonna.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: No "I told you so"...{LF}No "Look how stupid you are"...{#Name="Dito"}
source: No "I told you so"...{LF}No "Look how stupid you are"...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Nope! My lips are sealed.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Nope! My lips are sealed.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Your lips'll be torn off if you don't shut it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Your lips'll be torn off if you don't shut it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Finally! This is more my style.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Finally! This is more my style.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: All that jumpin' around was driving me crazy.{#Name="Zero"}
source: All that jumpin' around was driving me crazy.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm a lot better at slashing people to death. {#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm a lot better at slashing people to death. {#Name="Zero"}

translation: なるほど、性に合ってますな。たしかに{#Name="オクタ"}
source: なるほど、性に合ってますな。たしかに{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: The city is Lady Two's fortress!{LF}It must be protected at all costs!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: The city is Lady Two's fortress!{LF}It must be protected at all costs!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Hee hee hee hee hee! Lady Two... I see her!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Hee hee hee hee hee! Lady Two... I see her!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Snap out of it! You're hallucinating!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Snap out of it! You're hallucinating!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: The unclean must never be allowed{LF}to set foot in the Cathedral City!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: The unclean must never be allowed{LF}to set foot in the Cathedral City!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Indeed! How dare Zero put herself{LF}on equal footing with Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Indeed! How dare Zero put herself{LF}on equal footing with Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: As long as Lady Two is there for me,{LF}I desire nothing else!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: As long as Lady Two is there for me,{LF}I desire nothing else!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Bow before Lady Two, false Intoner!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Bow before Lady Two, false Intoner!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Fight for Lady Two!{LF}Our leader is the savior of all mankind!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Fight for Lady Two!{LF}Our leader is the savior of all mankind!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: You! Where's your equipment?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: You! Where's your equipment?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Fear not! Lady Two is my sword!{LF}Lady Two is my shield!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Fear not! Lady Two is my sword!{LF}Lady Two is my shield!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: The winds of Lady Two shall blow{LF}like a righteous hurricane!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: The winds of Lady Two shall blow{LF}like a righteous hurricane!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: These guys are fuckin' weird.{#Name="Zero"}
source: These guys are fuckin' weird.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You said it.{#Name="Cent"}
source: You said it.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: 'Course, who am I to talk? Look at you guys.{#Name="Zero"}
source: 'Course, who am I to talk? Look at you guys.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Keep your equipment, men! Stay in formation!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Keep your equipment, men! Stay in formation!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Man down! Man down over here!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Man down! Man down over here!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: The moment of judgment is here!{LF}Lady Two sees and knows all!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: The moment of judgment is here!{LF}Lady Two sees and knows all!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Look out! Wounded soldier here!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Look out! Wounded soldier here!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Okay. This is a bit creepy.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Okay. This is a bit creepy.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yeah. They're turning into a bunch of fanatics.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah. They're turning into a bunch of fanatics.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: A person's belief system can often{LF}push them over the brink.{#Name="Octa"}
source: A person's belief system can often{LF}push them over the brink.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: These foes are quite stubborn, hmm?{LF}We must hurry.{#Name="Octa"}
source: These foes are quite stubborn, hmm?{LF}We must hurry.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I wish I could burn these ruins{LF}and everyone in them.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I wish I could burn these ruins{LF}and everyone in them.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho ho! Always so impulsive...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho ho! Always so impulsive...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Still, I understand. You must be{LF}worried for your dragon.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Still, I understand. You must be{LF}worried for your dragon.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I am no such thing!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I am no such thing!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ここにもオカシイ奴がいたか{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ここにもオカシイ奴がいたか{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: トウは居なかったな……{#Name=" "}
source: トウは居なかったな……{#Name=" "}

translation: Is that the path to the exit?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Is that the path to the exit?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I suppose that means Lady Two{LF}was never here at all.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I suppose that means Lady Two{LF}was never here at all.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Yet we've heard the soldiers speak{LF}of the Cathedral City many times.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Yet we've heard the soldiers speak{LF}of the Cathedral City many times.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Cathedral City... That must be where One is.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Cathedral City... That must be where One is.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Then let's head to the Cathedral City.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Then let's head to the Cathedral City.{#Name="Zero"}
